# Building Inspection

## Kendrick Building Inspection

## .

### **If you are considering any building remodel or changes of any kind, please contact the City Hall at 208 289-5157.**

Latah County Building Inspection Service  
Latah County Building Department

**Address:**  
522 South Adams Street  
Moscow, Idaho, 83843

**Phone:**  
208-882-8580

**Hours:**  
Mon-Fri 9:00 AM-5:00 PM  
https://www.latah.id.us/planning\_building/

![Slide-1](https://www.cityofkendrick.com/wp-content/uploads/elementor/thumbs/Slide-1-piof67vpkyhlwxxkmy01jroe0oat3ifa826ecl6or4.jpg "Slide-1")

808 Railroad Street  
P.O. Box 195  
Kendrick, ID 83537  
(208) 289-5157  
[cityhall@cityofkendrick.com](mailto:cityhall@cityofkendrick.com)
